CmdLine: apk -Uv add su-exec coreutils perl perl-switch perl-datetime perl-lwp-protocol-https perl-digest-sha1  && apk -Uv --allow-untrusted -X http://dl-3.alpinelinux.org/alpine/edge/testing add perl-sys-syslog  && wget -O /tmp/aws-scripts-mon.zip http://aws-cloudwatch.s3.amazonaws.com/downloads/CloudWatchMonitoringScripts-1.2.1.zip  && mkdir /opt  && unzip -d /opt /tmp/aws-scripts-mon.zip  && chmod +x /opt/aws-scripts-mon/*.pl  && rm -rf /var/cache/apk/* /tmp/*
Commands.Name: run
